Kill Lara Croft

Lara's party mix

translation.en: He's in real pain right now.

translation.en: This is a major remodel. This is a disaster.
Was it programmed to stop before it took my head off?

translation.en: Well, that would be a, no.
But you said make it more challenging, so--
-Hence, the live fire. -Yeah.
Live rounds again.
Poor Simon, what has she done to you?
Very funny.
I'm only trying to turn you into a lady.
translation.es: Solo intento convertirla en una dama.

translation.en: -And a lady should be modest. -Yes, a lady should be modest.
translation.es: - Y una dama debe ser recatada.- Sí, una dama debe ser recatada.

translation.en: [man] Brothers and sisters,
Today is the 15th of May--
The first day of the planetary alignment--
translation.es: el primer díade la alineación planetaria,

translation.en: And we are still no nearer to discovering the location of the key.
translation.es: y seguimos sin descubrirla ubicación de la llave.

translation.en: It seems we are running out of time.
translation.es: Parece... que se nos acaba el tiempo.

translation.en: This is not acceptable.
Mr. Powell, your explanation for this is?
translation.es: Sr. Powell, ¿qué nos puede decirpara explicar esto?

translation.en: I have no explanation. Certainly no excuses.
translation.es: No tengo explicación.Y desde luego que no tengo excusas. Excepto recordarle respetuosamenteal consejo una vez más

translation.en: Except to once again respectfully remind the council...
translation.es: Excepto recordarle respetuosamenteal consejo una vez más

translation.en: That we are working from clues based on ancient cosmological models,
translation.es: que nos basamos en pistasde modelos cosmológicos antiguos

translation.en: Predating Aristotle.
But I'm happy to announce that we're almost ready.
translation.es: Pero es un placer anunciarque ya casi estamos listos.

translation.en: And I am supremely confident...
That we will have our answer in time for the relevant planetary alignment.
translation.es: de que tendré la respuesta a tiempopara la alineación planetaria.

translation.en: So, we will have possession of the key in...
translation.es: Así que ¿tendremos posesiónde la llave dentro de...

translation.en: One week.
Yes, indeed. One week.
This is good news, Mr. Powell, but remember:
translation.es: Son buenas noticias, Sr. Powell,pero recuerde

translation.en: We have only a single opportunity...
To retrieve the two halves of the triangle.
translation.es: de conseguirlas dos mitades del triángulo.

translation.en: And if we fail,
We must wait another 5,000 years.
I don't know about you, but that's more time...
translation.es: No sé usted, pero es más tiempo

translation.en: Than I am prepared to commit to this enterprise.
translation.es: del que yo quiero dedicarlea este proyecto.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -We shall be ready.
Trust me.
We're not, we're not ready, are we? No.
Good morning, Lara. And what a beautiful morning it is.
translation.es: Buenos días, Lara.Y qué bello día es.

translation.en: Back to work, I'm afraid.
translation.es: Me temo que debe regresar a trabajar.

translation.en: It's adventure time.
Egypt again.
It's nothing but pyramids and sand.
translation.es: No hay más que pirámides y arena.

translation.en: I know, gets everywhere, in the cracks.
translation.es: Lo sé. Se mete en todas partes,en las grietas.

translation.en: Spanish galleon?
Do you know what day it is, Hillary?
Yes, of course.
The 15th.
And that is never a good day.
translation.es: Y ese nunca es un buen día.

translation.en: I miss you, daddy.
I wish we could get back the time that was stolen from us.
translation.es: Ojalá pudiéramos recuperarel tiempo que nos robaron.

translation.en: [Lara] My father would love to have seen this.
translation.es: A mi padre le habría encantado ver esto.

translation.en: Tonight Pluto and Neptune align with Uranus.
translation.es: Hoy Plutón y Neptuno se alinean con Urano.

translation.en: It's the first stage of the alignment of all nine planets,
translation.es: Es la primera etapa de la alineaciónde los nueve planetas

translation.en: culminating in a full solar eclipse.
translation.es: que culminará con un eclipse total de sol.

translation.en: It only happens once every 5,000 years.
translation.es: Solo ocurre una vez cada 5000 años.

translation.en: When is the eclipse?
In one week from today.
But there is plenty to look out for until then.
translation.es: Pero hay muchas cosasque ver hasta entonces.

translation.en: Incredible.
[Man] I wish you could remember her.
translation.es: Ojalá pudieras recordarla.Te quería con el alma.

translation.en: -She loved you so much. -Mummy!
translation.es: Ojalá pudieras recordarla.Te quería con el alma. ¡Mamá!

translation.en: I wish I could remember her too.
I still have you, daddy.
translation.es: Pero te tengo a ti, papá.

translation.en: Yes, you do.
The exact alignment of the planets necessary to activate the triangle...
translation.es: La alineación planetaria necesariapara activar el triángulo

translation.en: Only occurs once every 5,000 years.
translation.es: solo ocurre una vez cada 5000 años.

translation.en: But that will prove to be just long enough...
translation.es: Pero esa resultará serla cantidad de tiempo exacta

translation.en: For little Lara Croft to grow up...
translation.es: para que la pequeña Lara Croft crezca

translation.en: [echoes] and to find it.
[Lara] Bryce!
[Knock on door] Hello, fellas.
-How's business? -Bryce!
[knocking] okay, okay. I'm coming. I'm coming.
We have 83 rooms. Why can't you live in the house?
translation.es: Tenemos 83 habitaciones.¿Por qué no vives en la casa?

translation.en: Well, I'm a free spirit, me.
translation.es: Pues, soy un hombre de espíritu libre.

translation.en: Right.
[sniffing] What's that smell?
5:00 a.m. Let's go.
This had better be good.
translation.es: Más vale que esto sea bueno.

translation.en: [yawns] It's a clock.
I found it last night. It was ticking.
Must be one of them ticking clocks?
translation.es: Debe ser uno de esos relojesque hacen tictac, ¿no?

translation.en: It was hidden in a secret room.
translation.es: Estaba escondido en un cuarto secreto.

translation.en: Bryce, don't start.
Well, Lara, it's a clock. It ticks. It tells the time. It's wrong.
translation.es: Lara, es un reloj. Hace tictac.Da la hora. Es la hora incorrecta.

translation.en: It started ticking last night during the first stage of the alignment.
translation.es: Comenzó a hacer tictac anoche durante la primera fasede la alineación.

translation.en: [sighs] Well, gonna need some coffee.
translation.es: Bueno, voy a necesitar un café.

translation.en: [whirs] Okay, in we go.
Looks pretty ordinary to me.
translation.es: A mí me parece común y corriente.

translation.en: Well, keep looking.
Your coffee, sir. Decaf latte with nonfat milk.
translation.es: Su café, señor. Café descafeinadocon leche descremada.

translation.en: Oh, champion. Steaming sump oil.
Wait. What did you do?
-I don't know. What did I do? -Where is that?
I don't know. I just took my hand off the fiber optics.
translation.es: No sé. Quité la mano de la fibra óptica.

translation.en: -[Hillary] what is that? -[Bryce] Oh, bugger!
Bugger.
Screw 13 to quadrant four.
Screw 14 to quadrant three.
Oh, please.
It's my map so I know where they all came from.
translation.es: Es mi mapa para saberla ubicación exacta de todo.

translation.en: It's camouflage.
Okay.
Hidden within.
[scoffs] What is that?
The all seeing eye.
translation.es: El ojo que todo lo ve.

translation.en: Lot 121, a Louis XV ormolu mounted bracket clock.
translation.es: Lote 121. Un reloj de apoyo Ormolu,época Luis XV.

translation.en: Showing on my left, 1,800,000 pounds.
translation.es: Está aquí a mi izquierda.1 800 000 libras.

translation.en: 1,800,000. Thank you. One million eight. 1,900,000.
Two million pounds. Two million pounds now.
translation.es: Dos millones de libras.Dos millones. Dos millones cien mil libras ahora.2 100 000 libras.
Dos millones cien mil libras ahora.2 100 000 libras.

translation.en: Any advance on 2,100,000 pounds?
Any more? Two million one. 2,200,000. Thank you, sir.
translation.es: ¿Ofrecen más? Dos millones cien mil.2 200 000. Gracias, señor.

translation.en: 2,200,000 pounds now.
translation.es: Dos millones doscientas mil libras. Ofrecen 2 200 000. 2 300 000.

translation.en: Two million three. 2,400,000.
Against you, sir. Two million five? No.
translation.es: Contra usted, señor.¿2 500 000? No. Dos millones cuatrocientas mil libras.La señorita ofrece 2 400 000. 2 500 000.

translation.en: 2,400,000 pounds, then. Lady's bid at two million four. 2,500,000 pounds.
translation.es: Dos millones cuatrocientas mil libras.La señorita ofrece 2 400 000. 2 500 000. Alguien más ofreció 2 500 000 libras.

translation.en: In a new place at 2,500,000 pounds. [relieved sigh]
Any more at 2,500,000 pounds? Sold.
[auctioneer continues] Lara, my dear.
-Mr. Wilson. -Let's go into my study. Let me take that for you.
translation.es: - Sr. Wilson.- Vayamos a mi estudio. Cargaré eso.

translation.en: Lara Croft. I don't believe it.
-I'll just be a minute. -Hi.
You still pretending to be a photo journalist?
translation.es: ¿Aún finges ser fotógrafa de la prensa?

translation.en: You know, I think it's really cool that you still have a day job,
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Creo que es maravillosoque aún tengas un empleo formal,

translation.en: Even though it's obviously just for show.
So, Alex, are you still pretending to be an archaeologist?
Lara, do we always have to fight like this?
I mean, maybe we don't.
-Maybe we do. -Why?
-You stole my prayer wheels. -Stole? Stole?
translation.es: - Me robaste mis ruedas de oración.- ¿Te las robé?

translation.en: From you? You know, that's funny. You know, it's--
It's not like you ever really owned them or anything.
Hey, you're the tomb raider.
translation.es: Oye, tú eres la saqueadora de tumbas.

translation.en: [Man] Mr. West, we are ready for you.
Oh, I think your clients need you.
translation.es: Creo que tus clientes te necesitan.

translation.en: Go ahead. You're wanted on the floor.
translation.es: Adelante. Te solicitan en la sala.

translation.en: After all, as you once said so memorably, "it's all just a business."
translation.es: Después de todo, como tú dijisteuna vez: "Esto solo es un negocio".

translation.en: Right? So, go do business.
translation.es: ¿Verdad? Así que ve a hacer negocios.

translation.en: Go.
Lara. Lara, you--
Lara, this is a unique object.
translation.es: Lara, este es un objeto único.

translation.en: Only one of the dials is working.
translation.es: Solo una de las esferas funciona.

translation.en: It glows like the eye, lesser.
translation.es: Brilla, como el ojo,pero con menor intensidad.

translation.en: But it seems to be getting brighter.
translation.es: Pero parece que la intensidad aumenta.

translation.en: And it's also running backwards--
Like it's not so much keeping time, but counting down to something.
translation.es: En vez de marcar la hora,parece llevar una cuenta regresiva.

translation.en: -Yes. -And look at the back.
translation.es: - Sí.- Y mire la parte de atrás.

translation.en: It's as though it fits into something, almost like a key.
translation.es: Es como si encajara en algo,casi como una llave.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, fascinating. Incredibly beautiful.
My father once told me of a magical triangle stamped with the all seeing eye.
translation.es: Mi padre una vez me contóde un triángulo mágico grabado con el ojo que todo lo ve.

translation.en: He said it gave its possessor extraordinary power--
translation.es: Dijo que le daba a su dueñopoder extraordinario.

translation.en: The power to control time.
translation.es: El poder de controlar el tiempo.

translation.en: He called it the triangle of light. Have you heard of it?
translation.es: Lo llamaba el Triángulo de Luz.¿Ha oído hablar de él?

translation.en: No. No, I haven't.
He always steered his own course, your father.
translation.es: Tu padre siempre seguía su propio rumbo.

translation.en: He was a great man.
Would you like some port?
-It's really very fine. -No.
I can't help you, Lara.
This clock truly is a mystery.
translation.es: Este reloj verdaderamente es un misterio.

translation.en: -[Lara] Hello. -Lara?
Hello, it's Mr. Wilson.
Yes. Well, I-- you see, I had a second thought...
translation.es: Sí. Pues, yo...Verás, estuve pensando mucho

translation.en: About that clock.
There is a man who may be able to help you.
translation.es: Hay un hombre que quizá podría ayudarte.

translation.en: I gave him your number. His name is Manfred Powell. You should see him.
translation.es: Le di tu número telefónico.Se llama Manfred Powell. Deberías verlo.

translation.en: Oh, thank you. I will.
-Good-bye, Lara. -You take care.
Thank you. [explosion]
Bugger.
Forgive me.
Lady Croft.
-Mr. Powell. -Oh, no, no, no. Good heavens, no.
translation.es: - Sr. Powell.- No. Por todos los cielos, no.

translation.en: I'm actually his associate, Mr. Pimms.
translation.es: De hecho, soy el señor Pimms,trabajo con él.

translation.en: -Mr. Pimms? -Yeah, like the beverage.
translation.es: - ¿El Sr. Pimms?- Sí, como la bebida.

translation.en: Yeah, she's here.
What does Mr. Powell do?
translation.es: ¿A qué se dedica el Sr. Powell?

translation.en: He's a lawyer. I'm his law clerk...
translation.es: Es abogado y yo soy su asistente legal.

translation.en: And fairly recent appointment, but enjoying it, all the varied work.
translation.es: Recientemente, me nombró su secretario,pero disfruto de la variedad del trabajo.

translation.en: -A lawyer. -Isn't it obvious?
Lady Croft, my pleasure. Manfred powell, Q.C.
translation.es: Señorita Croft, es un placer. - Manfred Powell, consejero de la reina.- Buenos días.

translation.en: -Good morning. -I believe you are quite an authority...
translation.es: - Manfred Powell, consejero de la reina.- Buenos días. Creo que usted es una autoridaden las cosas antiguas y mitológicas.

translation.en: -On things ancient and mythological. -Well, I travel.
translation.es: Creo que usted es una autoridaden las cosas antiguas y mitológicas. Pues, viajo.

translation.en: No, no, Mr. Wilson said you were quite the archaeologist.
translation.es: No, el Sr. Wilson dijoque era una gran arqueóloga.

translation.en: Please.
Oh, he's very sweet.
He knew your father, I believe.
translation.es: Me parece que conocía a su padre.

translation.en: Yes, they were great friends.
I had the honor of meeting him myself once, in Venice.
translation.es: Yo tuve el honor de verloen una ocasión, en Venecia.

translation.en: I was so sorry to hear about his death.
translation.es: Fue una pena enterarme de su muerte.

translation.en: This is the clock I spoke of.
translation.es: Este es el reloj del que le hablé.

translation.en: Very interesting.
It's a shame you only brought photographs.
Nevertheless, it is fascinating.
You said it started ticking the night of the alignment.
translation.es: Comenzó a hacer tictacla noche de la alineación.

translation.en: Yes.
You said you were a lawyer?
-Yes. -And the study of clocks is a hobby?
translation.es: - ¿Dijo ser abogado?- Sí. ¿Y el estudio de los relojeses un pasatiempo?

translation.en: This is an obsession.
Really my specialty. My practice centers around antiquities.
translation.es: Es mi especialidad. Mis casosse centran en antigüedades.

translation.en: But the origin of this clock...
Completely eludes me.
I think I've never seen anything quite so beautiful that I know so little about.
translation.es: Creo que nunca vi una belleza tal de la cual no supiera absolutamente nada.

translation.en: This is a pleasurable torment.
My ignorance amuses me.
"My ignorance amuses me."
[Scoffs] "My ignorance amuses me"?
Yes, well, I've always found your ignorance quite amusing.
translation.es: Sí, a mí siempre me ha hecho graciatu ignorancia.

translation.en: Powell, however, is not ignorant.
translation.es: - Powell, sin embargo, no es ignorante.- ¿No?

translation.en: -No? -No.
He's a liar.
-Anything you need? -No. Thank you, Hillary.
translation.es: - ¿Se le ofrece algo?- No. Gracias, Hillary.

translation.en: -Don't you stay up too late. -I won't.
translation.es: - No se vaya a dormir muy tarde.- No lo haré.

translation.en: Forward team, wait for my command.
translation.es: Equipo de vanguardia, espere mi orden.

translation.en: [man 2] In position awaiting your order.
translation.es: Estamos en posición esperando su orden.

translation.en: Bastards! [gunshots]
Bloody hell!
On the left. On the left.
-[beeping] -Come on, Simon, come on!
Come on. Come on!
translation.es: EL JUEGO TERMINÓCONSULTE A SU REPRESENTANTE

translation.en: [Bryce] Lara, Lara, are you there? Pick up!
Lara, can you hear me? Are you okay?
Bryce, I'm in the equipment room.
translation.es: Bryce, estoy en el cuarto del equipo.Quieren mi maldito reloj.

translation.en: -They're stealing my bloody clock. -I know. I saw them.
translation.es: Bryce, estoy en el cuarto del equipo.Quieren mi maldito reloj. Lo sé. Los vi.

translation.en: Bryce, you have to be my eyes.
translation.es: - Bryce, tienes que ser mis ojos.- ¿Estás armada?

translation.en: -Are you armed? -After a fashion, yes.
translation.es: - Bryce, tienes que ser mis ojos.- ¿Estás armada? Bueno, a mi manera.

translation.en: All right, three bad guys. Number one standing by the Aston Martin.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Hay tres hombres malos. El número uno está junto al Aston Martin.

translation.en: Right.
-Bingo! -[gunfire]
-Next. -Okay, number two, crouched by the McLaren.
translation.es: - El siguiente.- Bien, el número dos está agachado junto al McLaren.

translation.en: Oh, bugger!
-Are you okay? -I just found my car keys.
translation.es: - ¿Te encuentras bien?- Encontré las llaves de mi auto.

translation.en: You're done, mate. Nice one.
I think they've all gone.
translation.es: Creo que ya se fueron todos.

translation.en: Well, they got what they came for.
Sorry about that.
[gulps] That's fine.
Hello? [rap, indistinct]
What the hell happened here?
-Morning. -Lady Lara Croft?
Yes. You have something for me?
I woke up this morning, and I just hated everything.
Right. Thanks.
Who's Stribling, Clive and Winterset then?
Sounds like a bunch of lawyers. They are a bunch of lawyers.
translation.es: - Suena como un grupo de abogados.- Son abogados.

translation.en: -Well, I'll shut my face again. -You are nosy.
I'm not nosy. I just saw the name and asked her what the name was.
translation.es: No soy entrometido. Solo vi el nombre. Era un nombre curioso.Solo le pregunté el nombre.

translation.en: Lara?
It's from my father.
It was written before he died...
And delivered today as per his instructions.
translation.es: y dejó instruccionesde que me la entregaran hoy.

translation.en: Blimey!
[Lara reading] "To see a world in a grain of sand...
translation.es: "Para ver el mundo en un grano de arena,

translation.en: And a heaven in a wild flower,
translation.es: y el Cielo en una flor silvestre,

translation.en: Hold infinity in the palm of your hand,
translation.es: abarca el infinitoen la palma de tu mano,

translation.en: And eternity in an hour.
translation.es: y la eternidad en una hora".

translation.en: William Blake."
The all seeing eye.
translation.es: El ojo que todo lo ve.

translation.en: [Lord Croft's voice] My darling daughter,
I knew you'd figure this out.
If you are reading this letter, I am no longer with you,
translation.es: Si estás leyendo esta carta,yo ya no estoy contigo,

translation.en: And I miss you...
And love you always and forever.
It also means I have failed...
And must place an awful burden on your shoulders.
translation.es: y debo darte una responsabilidad terrible.

translation.en: Lara, by now I am sure you will have discovered the clock I concealed.
translation.es: Lara, estoy seguro que para ahoraya descubriste el reloj que escondí.

translation.en: The clock is the key, Lara.
translation.es: El reloj es la llave, Lara.

translation.en: It will unlock the hiding place of two pieces of a sacred icon.
translation.es: Abrirá el escondite de dos piezasde un ícono sagrado.

translation.en: This is the magical triangle I told you about when you were a little girl.
translation.es: Es el triángulo mágico del que te hablécuando eras una niña.

translation.en: The triangle of light. But it is no bedtime story.
translation.es: El Triángulo de Luz.Pero no es un cuento infantil.

translation.en: The triangle was forged from metal found in the crater of a meteor...
translation.es: El triángulo se forjó del metaldel cráter de un meteoro

translation.en: That had fallen to earth at the exact moment...
translation.es: que cayó en la Tierraen el preciso momento

translation.en: Of the previous alignment of the nine planets.
translation.es: de la previa alineaciónde los nueve planetas.

translation.en: The people of the light built a great city in this crater...
translation.es: La gente de la luz construyóuna ciudad en el cráter.

translation.en: Where they worshipped the triangle for its ability to control time.
translation.es: Rendían culto al triángulopor su habilidad de controlar el tiempo.

translation.en: It gave its possessor a power that could be used for good or great evil.
translation.es: Le daba a su dueño un poderque podía usarse para bien o para mal.

translation.en: The abuse of this power led to the destruction of the city.
translation.es: Un abuso del poder condujoa la destrucción de la ciudad.

translation.en: To be sure no man would ever again wield this power,
translation.es: Para asegurarse de que nadie volvieraa ejercer este poder,

translation.en: They split the triangle into two pieces...
translation.es: dividieron el triángulo en dos piezas

translation.en: And hid them at opposite ends of the earth.
translation.es: y las escondieronen extremos opuestos de la Tierra.

translation.en: Lara, do you remember the jasmine that only grows...
translation.es: Lara, ¿recuerdas el jazmínque solo crece en un templo

translation.en: In one temple along the ancient khmer trail in Cambodia?
translation.es: junto al antiguo sendero jemer en Camboya?

translation.en: Find that and you will have found the entrance to the tomb of the dancing light,
translation.es: Encuéntralo y habrás hallado la entrada de la Tumba de la Luz Danzante

translation.en: Where the first half of the triangle is hidden.
translation.es: donde está escondidala primera mitad del triángulo.

translation.en: You must be there at the exact moment...
translation.es: Debes estar ahí en el momento exacto

translation.en: of the second phase of the planetary alignment.
translation.es: de la segunda fasede la alineación planetaria.

translation.en: You must hurry. You have very little time.
translation.es: Debes darte prisa. Tienes muy poco tiempo.

translation.en: And as the planets move into alignment,
translation.es: Cuando los planetas comiencen a alinearse,

translation.en: The world will be in great danger,
translation.es: el mundo correrá un grave peligro,

translation.en: for the secret society known as the Illuminati--
translation.es: ya que la sociedad secretaconocida como los Illuminati,

translation.en: Devious dangerous men, who seek to fulfill an ancient prophecy...
translation.es: que son hombres arteros y peligrosos, buscan llevar a cabo una profecía antiguaal reunir las dos mitades

translation.en: by reuniting the two halves...
translation.es: buscan llevar a cabo una profecía antiguaal reunir las dos mitades

translation.en: And attaining the triangle's awesome and terrible powers.
translation.es: y conseguir los poderes asombrososy terribles del triángulo.

translation.en: This you must prevent at all costs.
translation.es: Debes impedira toda costa que esto suceda.

translation.en: So, Lara, I am asking you to complete my work--
translation.es: Por eso, Lara,te pido que termines mi labor:

translation.en: To find and destroy both halves of the triangle.
translation.es: encontrar y destruirambas mitades del triángulo.

translation.en: How are you going to get to Cambodia and get the clock back in 15 hours?
translation.es: ¿Cómo llegarás a Camboyay recuperarás el reloj en 15 horas?

translation.en: I'll be calling in a favor.
What kind of favor? Well, that is a secret.
translation.es: - ¿Qué favor le hizo?- Pues, es un secreto.

translation.en: If I told you, I'd have to kill you.
translation.es: Si te lo dijera, tendría que matarte.

translation.en: [Man on radio] Lady Croft, are you on target? Over.
translation.es: Señorita Croft,¿está sobre el objetivo? Cambio.

translation.en: Right on target. Thank you, boys. Over and out.
translation.es: Justo sobre él.Gracias, muchachos. Cambio y fuera.

translation.en: [Lara] Mr. Powell.
How predictable.
What are you doing here?
We have 72 minutes to the next alignment.
We have to work faster.
-Come on, guys! -[workers chanting]
[Alex] Come on, guys! Come on, pull!
Pull! It's coming!
Good.
So, any sign of Lady Croft?
Not yet.
Lara's overrated. She's good, don't get me wrong,
translation.es: Lara tiene más famade la que merece. Es buena,

translation.en: But she's in it for the glory,
translation.es: pero lo hace por la gloria,

translation.en: -whereas I'm in it for the money. -Fortunately.
translation.es: mientras que yo lo hago por el dinero. Afortunadamente.

translation.en: -Into the belly of the beast. -And out of the demon's ass.
translation.es: - A las entrañas de la bestia.- Y fuera del trasero del demonio.

translation.en: Jasmine.
Remember, what we are looking for is hidden not only in space...
translation.es: Lo que buscamos no soloestá escondido en el espacio,

translation.en: But also in time.
The clock is the key.
My god.
"Return the iron to the stone's embrace,
translation.es: "Regresa el hierro al abrazo de la piedra,

translation.en: the wheel of heaven will turn.
translation.es: y la rueda del Cielo girará.

translation.en: Exhume the light from its watery grave,
translation.es: Exhuma la luz de su tumba en el agua,

translation.en: to receive the gift of heaven...
translation.es: para recibir el regalo del Cielo

translation.en: As you are condemned to the depths of hell."
translation.es: ya que estás condenadoa las profundidades del infierno".

translation.en: Right. So, pretty much touch anything and you get your head chopped off.
translation.es: Bien. En resumen,si tocas algo, te degollarán.

translation.en: [Powell] We have two minutes, Mr. West.
You're the tomb raider. Figure it out.
translation.es: Usted es el saqueador de tumbas.Resuélvalo.

translation.en: Mr. West,
Yes, "time flies."
[Alex] It's the swords!
Come on, guys, get up here. Give me a hand here.
That's it. Come on. Coming down.
I want them all down. Take them, carry them across the ladders.
translation.es: Quiero que las bajen todas. Llévenlas del otro lado por las escaleras.

translation.en: -Come on, guys, let's hustle. -[men chattering]
[Alex] All right, now slide them into the slots over there.
translation.es: Bien. Ahora introdúzcanlasen las ranuras que están allá.

translation.en: [Powell] We place the clock here at the exact moment of alignment.
translation.es: Pondremos el reloj aquíen el momento exacto de la alineación.

translation.en: [Alex] Come on, let's go! Move it!
Too slow, ladies, too slow. Come on.
-[Alex] That's it. -Count it down.
translation.es: - Eso es.- Inicie la cuenta regresiva.

translation.en: -The timing needs to be exact. -No shit.
translation.es: - El momento debe ser exacto.- No me diga.

translation.en: [Alex] Sixty seconds to go.

translation.es: Cincuenta y nueve, 58, cincuenta y siete, 56,
cincuenta y siete, 56, cincuenta y cinco, 54,

translation.en: Fifty seconds.
[Lara] Mr. Powell!
Cease fire! Hold your fire!
-Keep counting. -You're making a big mistake!

translation.es: - Alex West.- Treinta y nueve, 38... Hola, Lara.

translation.en: -Hey, Lara. -Tourist visa?
-No, I'm working. -Lady Croft, tell me,
translation.es: - No, estoy trabajando.- Señorita Croft, dígame,

translation.en: is there a good reason why I kept you alive?
translation.es: ¿hay un buen motivo para que siga viva?

translation.en: [Alex continues counting] Yes. That is not the true eye.
translation.es: Sí. Ese no es el verdadero ojo.

translation.en: This is the true eye.
translation.es: - Este es el verdadero ojo.- De hecho, no es así.

translation.en: It's not, actually. It's a mirror image.
translation.es: - Este es el verdadero ojo.- De hecho, no es así. Es un reflejo exacto.

translation.en: Miss Croft, I think you're trying to cheat me out of my little ray of sunshine.
translation.es: Creo que quiere engañarmepara quitarme mi rayo de sol.

translation.en: Why would I try and cheat you out of anything now?
I need you to get the piece so I can steal it from you later.
translation.es: Necesito que consiga la piezapara robársela después.

translation.en: You're bluffing.
translation.es: Está mintiendo.Julius, haz una nota mental:

translation.en: Julius, make a mental note: kill miss Croft if she attempts any such thing.
translation.es: Está mintiendo.Julius, haz una nota mental: mata a la señorita Croftsi lo intenta.

translation.en: Yes, sir, Mr. Powell.
We can do it my way, or we can all come back in time for the next alignment,
translation.es: Lo hacemos a mi manera o regresamosen la siguiente alineación,

translation.en: and you are welcome to try and kill me then.
In, say another 5,000 years.
translation.es: Digamos que dentro de otros 5000 años.

translation.en: Ten... Nine... Eight...
Seven... Six... Five...
Four... Three...
Two... One...
Zero.
Well, I guess she was right.
The log must pierce the urn.
translation.es: El tronco debe atravesar la urna.

translation.en: Come on!
[Alex] It's slowing down. It's never gonna make it.
Pure light, fire and water.
-Get the clock. -Got it.
translation.es: Ve por el reloj. Voy por él.

translation.en: -[Alex] Hold it right there! -[gun cocks]
Lara, give it up.
Are you going to shoot me, Alex?
My phone is wet.
[Cell phone ringing] Yes? Lady Croft. How are you?
-Alive. -And kicking, I hope.
-And you? -Superlative.
Of course, I digress. You have my half of the triangle.
translation.es: Pero estoy divagando.Tiene mi mitad del triángulo.

translation.en: And you have my father's clock.
translation.es: Y usted tiene el reloj de mi padre.

translation.en: Listen, my dear. Without each other we are quite useless at this point.
translation.es: Escuche. El uno sin el otrosomos inútiles en este momento.

translation.en: We should reevaluate our positions.
Like it or not, you and I are in business together.
translation.es: Aunque no le guste, somos socios.

translation.en: We should have a business meeting.
You mean you'd love to have another opportunity to try and kill me.
translation.es: Quiere decir que le encantaría tenerotra oportunidad para matarme.

translation.en: Oh, that's harsh.
But perhaps. Wait and see.
Come to Venice, via Dolorosa.
translation.es: Vaya a Venecia, a la Via Dolorosa.

translation.en: Wonderful. Bye then.
Harder.
[Voice on tv] Here it comes. Hide, everybody.
Look out. It's some sort of machine. [Phone rings]
translation.es: Cuidado. Es alguna clase de máquina.

translation.en: -[Lara] Bryce? Bryce, it's me. -Hello?
[Tv mutes] Bryce, it's Lara.
translation.es: - ¿Hola?- Bryce, soy Lara. Hallé el templo.

translation.en: -I found the temple. Ran into Mr. Powell. -[sighs]
translation.es: - ¿Hola?- Bryce, soy Lara. Hallé el templo. - Me topé con Powell.- ¿Tienes el reloj?

translation.en: -Did you get the clock. -No, but I got the first piece.
translation.es: - Me topé con Powell.- ¿Tienes el reloj? No, pero tengo la primera pieza.

translation.en: Oh, beautiful, smashing.
-Seems I'm level pegging with Mr. Powell. -Well,
translation.es: Creo que trabajaré con el Sr. Powell.

translation.en: -won't he just want to kill you now? -No, silly.
His problem is that he needs the piece that I have.
translation.es: Su problema es que necesitala pieza que yo tengo.

translation.en: -Until then, I'm his new best friend. -What about the other half?
translation.es: Y hasta entonces,soy su nueva mejor amiga. ¿Y la otra mitad? La alineación final

translation.en: The final alignment is in 66 hours and 53 minutes,
translation.es: ¿Y la otra mitad? La alineación final es dentro 66 horas y 53 minutos,y aún no sabemos

translation.en: And we've still got no idea where the second piece is hidden.
translation.es: es dentro 66 horas y 53 minutos,y aún no sabemos dónde está escondida la segunda pieza.

translation.en: He's going to tell me where the second piece is.
translation.es: Él me dirá dónde está la segunda pieza.

translation.en: -He will? -Bryce, trust me. Pack for venice.
translation.es: - ¿Lo hará?- Confía en mí. Empaca para Venecia. ¿Empaco para ir a dónde?¿Hola? ¿Lara?

translation.en: Pack for where? Hello? Lara?
[scoffs] Bye then.
Drink.
Rest.
There's no rest for the wicked.
translation.es: No hay descanso para los malvados.

translation.en: You got what you came for?
-I did, yes. -Too bad.
-Bad for the world. -The world is safe now.
translation.es: Es malo para el mundo. El mundo está a salvo ahora.

translation.en: Little bit safer, perhaps,
Because you will go on.
Your father said you will never give up.
translation.es: Tu padre dijo que tú nunca te rendirías.

translation.en: My father? You knew my father?
Now, drink. Finish your tea.
-It tastes quite bad, -[laughs]
translation.es: Sabe muy mal, pero te hará bien.

translation.en: but it is good for you, see?
translation.es: Sabe muy mal, pero te hará bien. ¿Ves?

translation.en: Good evening.
You're with the Illuminati.
Beg your pardon? There's no such thing. It's just a bedtime story.
translation.es: ¿Cómo dice? No existe tal cosa.Es solo un cuento infantil.

translation.en: Illuminati.
The people of the light.
Have you brought my triangle?
No, of course you haven't. You've hidden it somewhere.
translation.es: No, claro que no lo trajo.Lo escondió en alguna parte.

translation.en: Well, you can keep the triangle you have,
and I will keep your father's clock, and we can be partners.
translation.es: y yo me quedaré con el relojde su padre. Seremos socios.

translation.en: Who sits here?
We can be partners and go for the big prize--
translation.es: Podemos ser sociosy buscar el gran premio:

translation.en: The triangle of light.
Yes, but who sits here?
It's an incredible dream, an awesome power.
translation.es: Es un sueño increíble,un poder extraordinario.

translation.en: It could set right so many wrongs.
I don't think you sit here, do you?
translation.es: Dudo que usted se siente aquí, ¿o sí?

translation.en: I sit here,
on God's right hand, as it were.
translation.es: a la mano derecha de Dios,por así decirlo.

translation.en: In fact, I now sit...
translation.es: De hecho, estoy sentado exactamentedonde su padre se sentaba.

translation.en: exactly where your father sat.
translation.es: estoy sentado exactamentedonde su padre se sentaba.

translation.en: You're lying.
No, he mentored me in the order.
translation.es: No, él fue mi mentor en la orden.

translation.en: It was truly an honor.
I don't believe you.
My father was not with the Illuminati. He would have told me.
translation.es: No era de los Illuminati. - Me lo habría dicho.- Tenía muchos secretos.

translation.en: He had a great many secrets.
translation.es: - Me lo habría dicho.- Tenía muchos secretos.

translation.en: Not from me.
Especially from you.
-I know what you want, Lara. -Oh, I doubt it.
translation.es: Sé lo que quiere, Lara. Lo dudo.

translation.en: Another life with your father,
a second chance.
It'll be within my power to give.
The triangle gives its possessor...
translation.es: El triángulo le da a su dueño...

translation.en: The power of God--
To move back and forth through time, undo the past.
translation.es: viajar en el tiempo, cambiar el pasado.

translation.en: Help me, and you will get what I know you want--
translation.es: Ayúdeme y obtendrá lo que sé que quiere:

translation.en: To have your father returned to you.
And how do I know once I gave you that piece...
translation.es: ¿Y cómo sé que una vezque le entregue esa pieza

translation.en: that you wouldn't then just try to kill me?
Would it make it easier for you--
On more familiar ground-- if I killed you now?
translation.es: en un terreno más familiar,que la matara ahora?

translation.en: Will you reconsider?
Hello, Alex.
I suppose you think I'm a greedy, unscrupulous sellout...
translation.es: - Hola, Alex.- Supongo que crees que soy un vendido avaro y sin escrúpulos

translation.en: And do just about anything for money. Yes, that's right.
translation.es: - y que haría todo por dinero.- Sí, así es.

translation.en: Well, the money bit's true, I guess.
translation.es: Supongo que lo del dinero es cierto.

translation.en: Is it, Alex?
If you cross me, we may not be able to remain friends.
translation.es: Si me traicionas, tal vezno podamos seguir siendo amigos.

translation.en: -Always a pleasure. -[sighs]
Now for a cold shower.
-[Pimms] I think we're in big trouble. -Hold this, will you?
translation.es: Creo que estamos en dificultades. - Sujeta esto, ¿quieres?- Gracias.

translation.en: Thank you. They already think we have Lady Croft's piece of the triangle.
translation.es: Creen que tenemos la piezadel triángulo de la señorita Croft.

translation.en: Yes. They think it's in that box you're carrying right now.
translation.es: Sí. Creen que está en esa cajaque estás cargando.

translation.en: -Is it? -Why don't you worry about something else?
Of course it's not.
I don't understand. What chance of success do we have without the piece?
translation.es: No entiendo. ¿Qué posibilidadesde éxito tenemos sin la pieza?

translation.en: Zero. Don't dwell on it.
translation.es: Cero. No pienses demasiado en ello. Pero...

translation.en: Lady Croft.
What a nice surprise.
Thank you.
Now, time to save the universe again then, is it?
translation.es: Es hora de salvar el universode nuevo, ¿no?

translation.en: Absolutely.
Are we sure she's really necessary?
Well, one tomb raider is good. Two, better.
translation.es: Pues, un saqueador de tumbases bueno. Dos son mejores.

translation.en: Me bum's gone to sleep again, all down the left cheek.
translation.es: Se me durmió el trasero.El glúteo izquierdo completo.

translation.en: Really? That's fascinating.
-How much longer? -A few hours.
We have to take the last hour over land. Helicopters won't fly near the ruined city.
translation.es: Recorreremos a pie la última hora. Los helicópteros no vuelancerca de las ruinas.

translation.en: It's a dead zone.
We take all doggies, da
Much-o U.S. Greenback, da. All doggies.
translation.es: Muchos dólares estadounidenses. Todos los perros.

translation.en: Welcome to the dead zone.
[grunts] It's not a country. It's an ice cube!
translation.es: No es un país, es un cubo de hielo.

translation.en: Come on!
All right. Let's go.
Go on, get it!
Holy shit.
It's a time storm. Time is broken here.
translation.es: Es una tormenta de tiempo.Aquí se rompe el tiempo.

translation.en: We must find the eye! All of you! Hurry!
We're running out of time! Hurry! Hurry!
It's begun.
Fifty bucks says the piece is inside the sun.
translation.es: Apuesto 50 dólaresa que está dentro del sol.

translation.en: For God's sake, hurry! The eclipse will be over in a few minutes!
translation.es: Por Dios, ¡apúrense! ¡El eclipseterminará en unos minutos!

translation.en: Alex, give me the clock. I know what to do.
translation.es: Alex, dame el reloj. Sé qué hacer.

translation.en: -[grunting] -Has she got the piece?
We will now unite these two parts--
The past and the present.
At last, we of the Illuminati...
Will control time and fulfill the sacred promise to our ancestors.
translation.es: controlaremos el tiempoy cumpliremos la promesa sagrada a nuestros ancestros.

translation.en: -Soon, the entire world will bow-- -Enough of this twaddle.
translation.es: - Pronto, el mundo entero será...- Ya basta de tantas estupideces.

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
Not quite what you hoped for, Mr. Powell?
translation.es: ¿No era lo que usted esperaba, Sr. Powell?

translation.en: Oh, Lara,
I have a gut instinct about this.
After all, you are the daughter of a genius.
translation.es: Después de todo,usted es la hija de un genio.

translation.en: Let me test my theory.
You had to let him go. No more bubbles.
translation.es: Tuvo que dejarlo morir.Ya no salen burbujas.

translation.en: You show me how to complete the triangle, we can change his fate.
translation.es: Muéstreme cómo armar el triángulo, y podremos cambiar el destino de Alex.

translation.en: If you deliver me the power of god, I will spare him.
translation.es: Si usted me entregael poder de Dios, él vivirá.

translation.en: It's only a little trip back in time.
translation.es: Es solo un corto viaje al pasado. Pero estoy seguro de que ustedya tiene la respuesta al problema.

translation.en: But I'm pretty sure you've figured out the answer to the problem.
translation.es: Pero estoy seguro de que ustedya tiene la respuesta al problema.

translation.en: And then, of course, there's the loss of your father.
translation.es: Y luego, claro,está la pérdida de su padre.

translation.en: I can change that.
You'd better be ready for this.
translation.es: Será mejor que se prepare para esto.

translation.en: -Unhook your laser sight. -Do it.
translation.es: - Deme su mira de láser.- Hazlo.

translation.en: "To see a world in a grain of sand."
translation.es: "Para ver el mundo en un grano de arena".

translation.en: Daddy?
Is this real?
It is a crossing...
Of my past and your present.
translation.es: de mi pasado y tu presente.

translation.en: Why did you not tell me about the Illuminati?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dijiste de los Illuminati?

translation.en: -You were only a child. -You could have written in your journals.
translation.es: Eras solamente una niña. Pudiste escribirlo en tus diarios.

translation.en: You never mentioned it-- not once. I burst to tell you everything.
translation.es: - Nunca lo mencionaste.- Ansiaba contártelo todo.

translation.en: But in the fierceness of my own battles,
translation.es: Pero en lo encarnizado de mis batallas, luché para decirte solamenteaquello que te inspiraría

translation.en: I strove to tell you only that which would inspire you and keep you safe.
translation.es: luché para decirte solamenteaquello que te inspiraría y mantendría a salvo.

translation.en: I love you so much.
But I've missed you.
And I have missed you.
I know why you came here--
translation.es: Sé por qué viniste y por qué tomaste el poderde la luz. No debes hacerlo.

translation.en: Why you took the power of the light-- but this must not happen.
translation.es: y por qué tomaste el poderde la luz. No debes hacerlo.

translation.en: Why? Why can't we use the power just this once?
translation.es: ¿Por qué? ¿Por qué no podemosusar el poder solo por esta vez?

translation.en: -Why can't you stay? -We can't change time.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no puedes quedarte? No podemos cambiar el tiempo.

translation.en: But time was stolen from us...
And it's not fair.
No, it's not fair.
But you have stolen time itself,
And you must give it back.
You must destroy the triangle.
Suddenly I feel so alone.
translation.es: De pronto, me siento muy sola.

translation.en: You're never alone. I am with you always, just as I've always been.
translation.es: Nunca estás sola. Siempre estoy contigo,como siempre lo he estado.

translation.en: -[soldier] Move out! -[groaning]
Wait!
Your father begged for his life when we caught him betraying us.
translation.es: Su padre suplicó por su vida cuando lo sorprendimos traicionándonos.

translation.en: He pleaded like a baby.
Surrender.
Never.
He seemed particularly concerned that I shouldn't... Take this.
translation.es: Parecía preocuparle especialmenteque no fuera a llevarme esto.

translation.en: Lara, no! The place is coming down! This is insane!
translation.es: Lara, ¡no! ¡El lugar se destruirá! - ¡Esto es una locura!- Sácalos de aquí.

translation.en: Get them out of here.
translation.es: - ¡Esto es una locura!- Sácalos de aquí.

translation.en: You just hurry.
There you go-- safe and sound.
No guns.
Oh, my god!
Quiet.
What?
